snippet.title: Crypt Custodian ► Top Hat Showcase + Summer Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming this summer to PC, Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, and the Xbox Family.

Crypt Custodian is charming metroidvania from veteran developer Kyle Thompson (Sheepo, Islets) about cleaning up the afterlife. Play as Pluto - a mischievous cat who has died, and is sentenced to be the afterworld's janitor... FOREVER! Hang out with other doomed ghosts, battle beasts, and explore a vastly expansive landscape. For those who have difficulty moving on, could there be... a way to still communicate with the living?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2394650/Crypt_Custodian/
